CustomField.description: This step is all about how we quantifies success for the customer. Is it a reduction in MTTR? Or a reduction in tickets? Or less downtime?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A score of 0 means we don't have any metrics. A score of 1 means that we know there is a project around this, but we don't know what the metrics are they are using to define success. A score of 2 means we know how the #'s they are using to define success.
CustomField.label: Metrics Score
